DOC.brief_summary: An open-label extension study use variable dose ( 20 30 mg daily ) bifeprunox evaluate long-term safety .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Bifeprunox Patients With Schizophrenia .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Outpatients successfully complete Wyeth study 3168A1313 . 2 . A signed date informed consent form study . 3 . No major protocol violation previous study . 1 . Clinically important abnormality precede shortterm study resolve . 2 . Use prohibit treatment precede shortterm study . 3 . Meeting exclusion criterion precede shortterm study
